question: 1) If 30 workers can build a wall in 48 hours, how many workers are required to build the same wall in 30 hours?
2) A factory produces 45 car engines with 15 machines in 5 days. How many engines will it produce in 7 days with the same machines working at the same rate?
3) If 5 pipes can fill a tank in 8 hours, how many hours will 4 pipes take to fill the same tank?
4) If the cost of 7 notebooks is Rs. 84, find the cost of 5 notebooks of the same type.
5) If 13 meters of cloth costs Rs. 780, how many meters can be purchased for Rs. 1560?
6) If 4 identical taps can fill a reservoir in 18 hours, how many identical taps are required to fill the same reservoir in 12 hours?
7) Twelve men can dig a trench in 16 days. How many men will be needed to dig it in 8 days, working at the same rate?
8) A cyclist covers 56 km in 7 hours. How far will he cover in 9 hours at the same speed?
9) A bus can travel 300 km in 5 hours. At the same speed, how long will it take to travel 480 km?
10) If 24 men can build a bridge in 40 days, how many days will 16 men take to build the same bridge?
11) If 6 pipes can fill a pool in 12 hours, how many hours will 9 pipes take to fill the pool, if all pipes have the same rate?
12) If the cost of 15 books is Rs. 675, how many books can be bought for Rs. 900?
13) 45 kg of sugar costs Rs. 1350. Find the cost of 72 kg of sugar.
14) If the ratio of A's age to B's age is 3:5 and A is 27 years old, find B's age.
15) A train covers 150 km in 3 hours. How far will it cover in 7 hours at the same speed?
16) Twelve copywriters can prepare an article in 15 hours. In how many hours will 9 copywriters prepare the same article?
17) If two pipes, each with the same flow rate, fill a tank in 9 hours, how long will three pipes, each with the same flow rate, take to fill it?
18) If 8 workers can build a fence in 27 days, how many days will 6 workers take to build the fence at the same rate?
19) An amount of Rs. 2700 is divided between A, B, and C in the ratio 2:3:4. What is C's share?
20) If 14 machines can produce 420 articles in 6 days, how many articles can 21 machines produce in 4 days at the same rate?
21) Five people can paint a house in 20 days. How many days will eight people take to paint the same house, working at the same rate?
22) A sum of Rs. 3200 is to be divided among X, Y, and Z in the ratio 4:5:7. Find Y's share in rupees.
23) If 6 typists can type a manuscript in 10 hours, how many typists will be required to type it in 5 hours at the same rate?
24) A bus covers 264 km in 6 hours. At the same speed, how much distance will it cover in 9 hours?
25) If 7 farmers can plough a field in 15 days, in how many days will 5 farmers plough it, working at the same rate?
26) If the cost of 9 calculators is Rs. 720, how many calculators can be bought for Rs. 1280?
27) Twelve pumps can empty a reservoir in 18 hours. If 9 pumps of the same capacity are used, how many hours will it take to empty the reservoir?
28) If 3 pumps can fill a tank in 16 hours, how many hours will 4 pumps take to fill the same tank at the same rate?
29) The cost of 4.5 kg of apples is Rs. 540. What will be the cost of 3 kg of apples?
30) If 16 workers can complete a project in 30 days, how many days will 20 workers take to complete the same project?
1) If 15 workers can complete a road-paving project in 20 days, how many workers are needed to complete it in 12 days?
2) A school's science lab uses 18 kilowatts in 6 hours. If they continue at the same usage rate, how many kilowatts will they use in 10 hours?
3) If 8 boxes weigh 72 kg, how many boxes will weigh 198 kg?
4) Four large pumps can drain a flooded basement in 8 hours. How long will it take two large pumps to drain the same basement?
5) If 5 teachers can grade 360 exam papers in 6 hours, how many exam papers can 4 teachers grade in 5 hours?
6) If a bus covers 180 km in 3 hours, how far will it travel in 5 hours at the same speed?
7) A sum of Rs. 4200 is divided among P, Q, and R in the ratio 3:4:5. How much does Q receive?
8) Eight men can paint four houses in 10 days. How many days will 10 men take to paint the same four houses?
9) Ten pumps can fill a swimming pool in 9 hours. How many hours will 15 pumps take to fill the same pool at the same rate?
10) If 12 chocolate bars cost Rs. 156, how many such bars can be purchased for Rs. 650?
11) A train covers 288 km in 4 hours. At the same speed, how long will it take to cover 432 km?
12) If 6 people can design a website in 15 days, how many days will 5 people take to design the same website at the same rate?
13) If 20 meters of fabric cost Rs. 1000, how many meters can be bought for Rs. 1750?
14) A painting job can be completed by 4 painters in 12 days. How many painters are needed to finish it in 8 days?
15) If 9 machines can produce 225 mobile phones in 5 days, how many mobile phones can 12 machines produce in 5 days at the same rate?
16) If 2400 bricks weigh 1200 kg, how much do 800 bricks weigh?
17) The ratio of the angles of a triangle is 3:4:5. Which of the following is the correct measure of its angles?
18) If 8 men can build a cabin in 40 days, how many men are needed to do the same job in 16 days?
19) A water tank is filled by 2 hoses in 24 hours. How many hoses of the same capacity are needed to fill the tank in 6 hours?
20) If 3 men can complete 3 units of work in 3 days, how many men are needed to complete 9 units of work in 3 days at the same rate?
21) A mixture has sugar and milk in the ratio 2:5. If there are 70 liters of milk, how many liters of sugar are in the mixture?
22) If 7 trucks can transport 63 tons of cargo in 5 days, how many trucks are needed to transport 99 tons of cargo in 5 days at the same rate?
23) Twelve typists can type 300 pages in 5 days. How many days will 8 typists take to type the same 300 pages at the same rate?
24) If 5 men can read 25 books in 10 days, how many days will 10 men take to read 40 books at the same rate?
25) If 15 washers can wash 60 cars in 5 hours, how many cars will 18 washers wash in the same 5 hours at the same rate?
26) Two taps can fill a pool in 30 hours. If two more taps of the same capacity are added, how many hours will it take to fill the pool?
27) A farmer has enough feed for 20 cows for 15 days. If he buys 5 more cows, how many days will the same amount of feed last?
28) If 6 identical tubes can fill 300 balloons with water in 4 hours, how many balloons will 9 identical tubes fill in 4 hours at the same rate?
29) A sum of Rs. 3600 is to be divided among X, Y, Z in the ratio 3:3:4. Find Y's share.
30) If 10 printers can print 1000 pages in 2 hours, how many hours will it take 8 printers to print the same number of pages at the same rate?
